    IMPORTANT NOTICE! This is not a testnet. This login page gives you direct access to the real Ardor public blockchain. Use at your own risk. Our team is dedicated to keeping this website secure and up to date at all times but Jelurida disclaims all liability regarding eventual loss of funds or stolen passphrases which might arise as a result of malicious third party actions against this website. This is a read-only wallet, sending any type of transactions, forging, bundling, or shuffling, is disabled.

    Log in with your TestNet account!
    Your passphrase should be 12 characters in length or more, ideally over 35 characters. If you want to log in with this unsafe passphrase, hit ENTER again. If you are a new user, click the registration link below to register a secure passphrase.
    Active Plugins  Security Notice
     
    Your passphrase must be at least 35 characters long.
    Attention:

    This option is for advanced users only!

    The passphrase is everything that stands between your account and the rest of the world. Do not use any meaningful sentence, especially any that appears in song or literature. Use randomness with enough bits of entropy for the case. If in doubt, click Cancel and use automatically generated passphrase.

      
     
    Advanced users only: click here to choose your own passphrase.

            Welcome to the Marketplace

            Here you may find various goods and services at your disposal.
            In order to find what you need, you can search through them or use the tags of interest.

            You can further open a store to list your goods and services, receive feedback and give a discount.
            When using this functionality, please respect the privacy and dignity of other users.

            The decentralized nature of the blockchain allows listing of any inappropriate material.
            Please, make sure to comply with local legislation when using the Marketplace.

                              Add Approval Model

                              Transaction execution is deferred, however transaction doesn't need further approval to become valid
                              Transaction has to be approved by a certain number of accounts
                              Transaction has to be approved by accounts holding a certain total amount of coin
                              Transaction has to be approved by asset holders with a certain total stake
                              Transaction has to be approved by currency holders with a certain total stake
                              Transaction is executed only if the sender or recipient have certain account properties
                              Transaction is executed only if another transaction having the specified full hash is included in the blockchain
                              Transaction is approved by revealing a secret message matching the specified hash
                              Transaction is approved based on the boolean expression defined by the model
